Name: Tomato Way 3
About the game: Description: An eternal slasher & shooter game. Ugly enemies, awesome bosses and tons of dark humor. You can slice your enemies with a fork, splatter them with a machine gun or simply mash 'em up with a flashlight. The plot of Tomato Way 3 takes place between the events of Tomato Way 1 and 2. Knowing the story of the other two parts is unnecessary yet recommendable. It's a grandiose end to the game series about a tomato hungry for some meat.
